sites.name: Pencil
sites.description: Pencil is a page that has informative information about pencils. It uses basic HTML and CSS to make the page look the way it does

sites.name: Mass Shootings
sites.description: Mass Shooting is a website that takes in a data of shootings that happened throughout the US. Those data are then plotted on a map; user can find more information about each data point by clicking on the point
